oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Dancing school at Grove Recreation Center
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A woman and children join hands in a circle and one girl is in the center of the circle.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Children; Dance; Grove Recreation Center; Interiors
Deal, Susy; Giany, Lois; Giboney, Ann; Harper, Nonita; McKnight, Joan; Murry, Jeanette; Murry, Sharon; Page, Sammy; Sanders, Luanne; Slubley, Vivian; Warden, Bob; Whitworth, Denis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of March 22, 1945. Clockwise from Miss Slubley; Sammy Page, Bob Warden, Denis Whitworth, Nonita Harper, Sharron Murry, Susy Deal, Joan McKnight, Ann Giboney, Luanne Sanders, Lois Giany. At center, Jeanette Murry.
PRO 343-2; 3-5-1945; Dancing School, Grove Recreation Center
